title: Onnanoko Awase
sinopse:
1. Onnanoko Awase (Girls' Union)
2. Koi no Iinari (Slave to Love)
3. Omoide Musubi (Full of Memories)
4. Seiya no Agape (Christmas Eve Agape)
5. Umikaze ga Kaoru (The Fragrant Sea Breeze)
6. Angelic Girl
7. Cherry na Kanojo (Cherry Girl)
8. Kanojo no Kanojo (Her Girlfriend)
